    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    AttackBoost.use(Monster monster)
    Increases the base attack damage of a given Monster by an amount based on the Rarity of the item.
    String
    HealthBoost.use(Monster monster)
    Increases the base health of a given Monster by an amount based on the Rarity of the item.
    abstract String
    Item.use(Monster monster)
    Applies the unique effect of the item to a given Monster.
    String
    RandomStatBoost.use(Monster monster)
    Randomly boosts either the base health or base attack damage of a monster.
    String
    RandomTrigger.use(Monster monster)
    Sets the Trigger for a given Monster to a random trigger.
    String
    SelectTrigger.use(Monster monster)
    Applies the Trigger of the Item to a Monster.
    String
    SpeedBoost.use(Monster monster)
    Increases the speed of a given Monster by an amount based on the Rarity of the item.
